mapper.update: UPDATE MIND_MGR SET MGR_STATUS = #{mgrStatus}, USE_YN = #{useYn}, MODI_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE MIND_MGR SET MGR_STATUS = #{mgrStatus}, MODI_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT A.USER_ID, A.USER_NM, A.CENTER_SEQ, A.EMAIL, (SELECT CENTER_NM FROM MIND_CENTER B WHERE B.CENTER_SEQ = A.CENTER_SEQ) AS centerNm FROM MIND_MGR A WHERE A.USER_TYPE = '3001' AND A.USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT USER_ID, CENTER_SEQ FROM MIND_MGR WHERE USER_TYPE = '3001' AND MGR_STATUS = 'Y' AND USE_YN = 'Y' AND USER_ID = #{userId}
SELECT USER_ID, CENTER_SEQ FROM MIND_MGR WHERE USER_TYPE = '3001' AND MGR_STATUS = 'Y' AND USE_YN = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MIND_SCHEDULE (CENTER_SEQ, USER_ID, HOLIDAY_YN, YMD, SCHEDULE_TYPE, ST_TIME, ED_TIME, REG_DT, REG_ID) SELECT #{centerSeq} as CENTER_SEQ, #{userId} as USER_ID, 'N' as HOLIDAY_YN, #{ymd} AS YMD, 100562 as SCHEDULE_TYPE, temp.ST_TIME, temp.ED_TIME, DATE_FORMAT(now(),'%Y%m%d%H%i%S') as REG_DT, #{regId} as REG_ID FROM ( SELECT '0900' AS ST_TIME, '1000' AS ED_TIME from dual UNION ALL SELECT '1000' AS ST_TIME, '1100' AS ED_TIME from dual UNION ALL SELECT '1100' AS ST_TIME, '1200' AS ED_TIME from dual UNION ALL SELECT '1200' AS ST_TIME, '1300' AS ED_TIME from dual UNION ALL SELECT '1300' AS ST_TIME, '1400' AS ED_TIME from dual UNION ALL SELECT '1400' AS ST_TIME, '1500' AS ED_TIME from dual UNION ALL SELECT '1500' AS ST_TIME, '1600' AS ED_TIME from dual UNION ALL SELECT '1600' AS ST_TIME, '1700' AS ED_TIME from dual UNION ALL SELECT '1700' AS ST_TIME, '1800' AS ED_TIME from dual UNION ALL SELECT '1800' AS ST_TIME, '1900' AS ED_TIME from dual UNION ALL SELECT '1900' AS ST_TIME, '2000' AS ED_TIME from dual ) temp WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT * FROM MIND_SCHEDULE B WHERE B.YMD = #{ymd} AND B.USER_ID = #{userId} AND B.ST_TIME = temp.ST_TIME AND B.ED_TIME = temp.ED_TIME )
mapper.update:
UPDATE MIND_MGR SET
USER_NM = #{userNm},
RRN = #{rrn},
EMAIL = #{email}, MOBILE = #{mobile}, AUTH_MOBILE = #{mobileSms}, MODI_YN = 'N',
CENTER_OWNER_YN = #{centerOwnerYn},
MODI_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), MODI_ID = #{modiId} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}

UPDATE MIND_MGR_SUB SET
UNIVERSITY = #{university}, DEPARTMENT = #{department}, MEMO = #{memo}, EDUCATION = #{education}, EDU_STATUS1 = #{eduStatus}, EDU_YEAR1 = #{eduYear}, UNIVERSITY2 = #{university2}, DEPARTMENT2 = #{department2}, EDUCATION2 = #{education2}, EDU_STATUS2 = #{eduStatus2}, EDU_YEAR2 = #{eduYear2}, UNIVERSITY3 = #{university3}, DEPARTMENT3 = #{department3}, EDUCATION3 = #{education3}, EDU_STATUS3 = #{eduStatus3}, EDU_YEAR3 = #{eduYear3}, CORE_ABILITY = #{coreVal}, CAREER = #{career}, WORK_TYPE = #{workType},
FILE_NM = #{fileNm},
FILE_PATH = #{filePath},
GENDER = #{gender}, CHANNEL_TYPE = #{channelType}, MENTAL_AGES = #{mentalAges}, MENTAL_DIV = #{mentalDiv}, MENTAL_DIV_ETC = #{mentalDivEtc}, MENTAL_TYPE = #{mentalType}, LAW_DIV = #{lawDiv}, LAW_TYPE = #{lawType}, FINANCE_DIV = #{financeDiv}, FINANCE_TYPE = #{financeType}, DIAGNOSIS_AGES = #{diagnosisAges}, DIAGNOSIS_DIV = #{diagnosisDiv}, DIAGNOSIS_DIV_ETC = #{diagnosisDivEtc}, DIAGNOSIS_TYPE = #{diagnosisType}, COUNSEL_LANGUAGE = #{languageType}, COUNSEL_SPECIAL = #{specialType}, COUNSEL_JOB = #{jobType}, COUNSEL_PERSONAL = #{personalType}, COUNSEL_FAMILY = #{familyType}, COUNSEL_TRAUMA = #{traumaType}, COUNSEL_TARGET = #{targetType}, COUNSEL_LAW = #{lawCounselType}, COUNSEL_FINANCE = #{financeCounselType}, COUNSEL_FAVOR = #{preferredType}, COUNSEL_PATTERN = #{tendencyType}, COUNSEL_SPECIAL_HEAL = #{specialHearing} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}

INSERT INTO EXTRA_MIND_MGR (
USER_NM,
CENTER_SEQ,
RRN,
EMAIL, MOBILE, AUTH_MOBILE, MODI_YN,
CENTER_OWNER_YN,
MODI_DT, MODI_ID, USER_ID ) VALUES (
#{userNm},
#{centerSeq},
#{rrn},
#{email}, #{mobile}, #{mobileSms}, 'N',
#{centerOwnerYn},
DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), #{modiId}, #{userId} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE
USER_NM = #{userNm},
CENTER_SEQ = #{centerSeq},
RRN = #{rrn},
EMAIL = #{email}, MOBILE = #{mobile}, AUTH_MOBILE = #{mobileSms}, MODI_YN = 'N',
CENTER_OWNER_YN =#{centerOwnerYn},
MODI_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), MODI_ID = #{modiId}, USER_ID = #{userId}

INSERT INTO EXTRA_MIND_MGR_SUB ( UNIVERSITY , DEPARTMENT, MEMO, EDUCATION, EDU_STATUS1, EDU_YEAR1, UNIVERSITY2 , DEPARTMENT2, EDUCATION2, EDU_STATUS2, EDU_YEAR2, UNIVERSITY3 , DEPARTMENT3, EDUCATION3, EDU_STATUS3, EDU_YEAR3, CAREER, WORK_TYPE, GENDER, CHANNEL_TYPE, MENTAL_AGES, MENTAL_DIV, MENTAL_DIV_ETC, MENTAL_TYPE, LAW_DIV, LAW_TYPE, FINANCE_DIV, FINANCE_TYPE, DIAGNOSIS_AGES, DIAGNOSIS_DIV, DIAGNOSIS_DIV_ETC, DIAGNOSIS_TYPE, COUNSEL_LANGUAGE, COUNSEL_SPECIAL, COUNSEL_JOB, COUNSEL_PERSONAL, COUNSEL_FAMILY, COUNSEL_TRAUMA, COUNSEL_TARGET, COUNSEL_LAW, COUNSEL_FINANCE, COUNSEL_FAVOR, COUNSEL_PATTERN, CORE_ABILITY, USER_ID, COUNSEL_SPECIAL_HEAL ) VALUES ( #{university}, #{department}, #{memo}, #{education}, #{eduStatus}, #{eduYear}, #{university2}, #{department2}, #{education2}, #{eduStatus2}, #{eduYear2}, #{university3}, #{department3}, #{education3}, #{eduStatus3}, #{eduYear3}, #{career}, #{workType}, #{gender}, #{channelType}, #{mentalAges}, #{mentalDiv}, #{mentalDivEtc}, #{mentalType}, #{lawDiv}, #{lawType}, #{financeDiv}, #{financeType}, #{diagnosisAges}, #{diagnosisDiv}, #{diagnosisDivEtc}, #{diagnosisType}, #{languageType}, #{specialType}, #{jobType}, #{personalType}, #{familyType}, #{traumaType}, #{targetType}, #{lawCounselType}, #{financeCounselType}, #{preferredType}, #{tendencyType}, #{coreVal}, #{userId}, #{specialHearing} ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE USER_ID = #{userId}, UNIVERSITY = #{university}, DEPARTMENT = #{department}, MEMO = #{memo}, EDUCATION = #{education}, EDU_STATUS1 = #{eduStatus}, EDU_YEAR1 = #{eduYear}, UNIVERSITY2 = #{university2}, DEPARTMENT2 = #{department2}, EDUCATION2 = #{education2}, EDU_STATUS2 = #{eduStatus2}, EDU_YEAR2 = #{eduYear2}, UNIVERSITY3 = #{university3}, DEPARTMENT3 = #{department3}, EDUCATION3 = #{education3}, EDU_STATUS3 = #{eduStatus3}, EDU_YEAR3 = #{eduYear3}, CORE_ABILITY = #{coreVal}, CAREER = #{career}, WORK_TYPE = #{workType},
FILE_NM = #{fileNm},
FILE_PATH = #{filePath},
GENDER = #{gender}, CHANNEL_TYPE = #{channelType}, MENTAL_AGES = #{mentalAges}, MENTAL_DIV = #{mentalDiv}, MENTAL_DIV_ETC = #{mentalDivEtc}, MENTAL_TYPE = #{mentalType}, LAW_DIV = #{lawDiv}, LAW_TYPE = #{lawType}, FINANCE_DIV = #{financeDiv}, FINANCE_TYPE = #{financeType}, DIAGNOSIS_AGES = #{diagnosisAges}, DIAGNOSIS_DIV = #{diagnosisDiv}, DIAGNOSIS_DIV_ETC = #{diagnosisDivEtc}, DIAGNOSIS_TYPE = #{diagnosisType}, COUNSEL_LANGUAGE = #{languageType}, COUNSEL_SPECIAL = #{specialType}, COUNSEL_JOB = #{jobType}, COUNSEL_PERSONAL = #{personalType}, COUNSEL_FAMILY = #{familyType}, COUNSEL_TRAUMA = #{traumaType}, COUNSEL_TARGET = #{targetType}, COUNSEL_LAW = #{lawCounselType}, COUNSEL_FINANCE = #{financeCounselType}, COUNSEL_FAVOR = #{preferredType}, COUNSEL_PATTERN = #{tendencyType}, COUNSEL_SPECIAL_HEAL = #{specialHearing}
UPDATE MIND_MGR SET MODI_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), MODI_YN = 'N' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE MIND_MGR SET MODI_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), MODI_YN = 'Y' WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}

UPDATE MIND_MGR_SUB SET UNIVERSITY = #{university}, DEPARTMENT = #{department},
EDUCATION = #{education},
MEMO = #{memo}, CAREER = #{career},
CORE_ABILITY = #{coreVal},
FILE_NM = #{fileNm},
FILE_PATH = #{filePath},
WORK_TYPE = #{workType}
WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
UPDATE MIND_MGR SET CENTER_OWNER_YN = 'N', MODI_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s') WHERE USER_ID = #{loginId}
mapper.select:
SELECT B.USER_NM AS userNm , B.USER_ID AS userId , B.RRN AS rrn , A.GENDER AS gender , B.MOBILE AS mobile , SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING_INDEX(B.MOBILE, '-', 1), LENGTH(SUBSTRING_INDEX(B.MOBILE, '-', 1 - 1)) + 1) AS mobile1 , SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING_INDEX(B.MOBILE, '-', 2), LENGTH(SUBSTRING_INDEX(B.MOBILE, '-', 2 - 1)) + 2) AS mobile2 , SUBSTRING(SUBSTRING_INDEX(B.MOBILE, '-', 3), LENGTH(SUBSTRING_INDEX(B.MOBILE, '-', 3 - 1)) + 2) AS mobile3 , B.EMAIL AS email , A.EDUCATION AS education , A.UNIVERSITY AS university , A.DEPARTMENT AS department , A.MEMO AS memo , A.CAREER AS career , A.WORK_TYPE AS workType , A.File_NM AS fileNm , A.File_PATH AS filePath , B.CENTER_OWNER_YN AS centerOwnerYn , A.CHANNEL_TYPE AS channelType , A.MENTAL_AGES AS mentalAges , A.MENTAL_DIV AS mentalDiv , A.MENTAL_DIV_ETC AS mentalDivEtc , A.MENTAL_TYPE AS mentalType , A.LAW_DIV AS lawDiv , A.LAW_TYPE AS lawType , A.FINANCE_DIV AS financeDiv , A.FINANCE_TYPE AS financeType , A.DIAGNOSIS_AGES AS diagnosisAges , A.DIAGNOSIS_DIV AS diagnosisDiv , A.DIAGNOSIS_DIV_ETC AS diagnosisDivEtc , A.DIAGNOSIS_TYPE AS diagnosisType , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(B.REG_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS regDt , DATE_FORMAT(STR_TO_DATE(B.MODI_DT, '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'),'%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS modiDt , B.MODI_ID AS modiId , C.CENTER_NM AS centerNm , B.CENTER_SEQ AS centerSeq , B.MEMO1 AS memo1 , B.PRICE AS price , B.MGR_STATUS AS mgrStatus
, (select AUTH_CD from acl_user_auth where USER_AUTH_KEY = CONCAT(#{userId},(SELECT user_type FROM ez_mind.mind_mgr where user_id =#{userId}))) as authCd FROM MIND_MGR_SUB A, MIND_MGR B, MIND_CENTER C WHERE 1=1 AND B.CENTER_SEQ = C.CENTER_SEQ AND B.MGR_FLAG='C'
AND B.USER_ID = #{userId}
AND A.USER_ID = B.USER_ID
SELECT USER_ID AS userId FROM MIND_MGR WHERE 1=1 AND USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO acl_user_auth ( USER_AUTH_KEY , AUTH_CD , REG_DT ) VALUES ( CONCAT(#{userId},'3001') , #{authCd} , date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d%h%i%s') )
INSERT INTO acl_user_auth ( USER_AUTH_KEY , AUTH_CD , REG_DT ) VALUES ( CONCAT(#{userId},(SELECT user_type FROM mind_mgr where user_id =#{userId})) , #{authCd} , date_format(now(), '%Y%m%d%h%i%s') )
mapper.update:
UPDATE MIND_MGR SET
USER_NM = #{userNm},
RRN = #{rrn},
EMAIL = #{email}, MOBILE = #{mobile},
MEMO1 = #{memo1}, PRICE = #{price}, MGR_STATUS=#{mgrStatus},
CENTER_OWNER_YN = #{centerOwnerYn},
MODI_DT = DATE_FORMAT(NOW(), '%Y%m%d%H%i%s'), MODI_ID = #{modiId} WHERE USER_ID = #{userId}
mapper.select: SELECT a.user_id AS userId, a.user_nm AS userNm, a.rrn AS rrn, (select center_nm from mind_center where center_seq = a.center_seq) AS centerNm, case(b.EDUCATION) when 'D' then '박사' when 'M' then '석사' else b.CAREER end AS education, b.UNIVERSITY AS university, b.DEPARTMENT AS department, b.CAREER AS career, (SELECT group_concat(distinct FN_GET_COMM_NM(cert_cd)) from mind_mgr_cert where user_id = a.user_id) AS cert, (SELECT group_concat(etc) from mind_mgr_cert where user_id = a.user_id) AS etcCert, a.use_yn AS useYn, (CASE WHEN D.AUTH_CD = 'ROLE_PARTNER_CENTER' THEN '센터장' WHEN D.AUTH_CD = 'ROLE_PARTNER_SANGDAM' THEN '상담' WHEN D.AUTH_CD = 'ROLE_PARTNER_SEND' THEN '파견' WHEN D.AUTH_CD = 'ROLE_PARTNER_GROUP' THEN '집단' WHEN D.AUTH_CD = 'ROLE_PARTNER_TEACHER' THEN '강사' END) AS authCd FROM (select * from mind_mgr where user_type = '3001' ) as a left join mind_mgr_sub b on a.USER_ID = b.USER_ID , ACL_USER_AUTH AS D WHERE 1=1 AND a.user_id not in ('32827980', 'b3817', 'bookmount', 'hkinternational', 'test10234') AND a.center_seq is not null AND D.USER_AUTH_KEY = CONCAT(A.USER_ID,'3001') ORDER BY a.center_seq, a.USER_ID
